app_name: Fetch Rewards: Grocery Savings & Gift Cards
app_detail:
Fetch Rewards is shopping made more rewarding and waaay easier. Thatâ€™s it. Thatâ€™s what we do. Any questions?

Ok, ok, a little more about us: Fetch Rewards is a mobile savings and gift cards earning app (with a slick interface, if we do say so ourselves) that rewards you for the purchases you already make. Just snap pictures of your receipts to win gift cards and watch the rewards roll in. Life is complicated enough, so we do the legwork and bring the savings to you. No more cutting coupons and no long wait for rewards like with other shopping rewards apps. Just shop, scan, and save. Itâ€™s that easy (being the easiest way to save is kind of our thing). 

ğŸ›’ Shop smart. Fetch Rewards serves up rewards on groceries from any store (yes, we mean ANY)!

Youâ€™ll earn money back on your grocery shop every time you purchase one of thousands of participating products. You can submit grocery receipts from ANY store where you buy grocery and household items to win gift cards.

Save on the things you already buy, every time you buy them. No moving targets. 

Upload receipts from:

- Local grocery stores
- Chain grocery stores
- Liquor stores*
- Convenience stores
- Gas Stations
- Drugstores
- Big Box and Club Membership stores
- Pet stores
- Hardware stores

*Please note that discounts on alcohol are not available in states where itâ€™s prohibited by law or for anyone under the age of 21

ğŸ¤³ Grab your phone and snap a picture of any grocery receipt to earn free gift cards - fast and easy! 

Points are quite literally in your pocket. Get out your phone, take a pic of your grocery receipt, and youâ€™ll instantly earn money on thousands of popular products. The more receipts you scan, the more grocery shopping rewards you earn, and the more money you save. Pretty sweet deal, right? No coupons necessary because Fetch Rewards automatically delivers those savings. Earn gift cards for big retailers like Amazon in an instant.

Didnâ€™t get around to scanning your receipt right after shopping? No worries, you have up to 14 days AFTER the purchase date on the receipt to scan. Have a super long receipt? Donâ€™t sweat it, you can upload multiple images per receipt. With the Fetch Rewards shopping app, itâ€™s easy to earn money back on thousands of popular products.

ğŸ’… Treat yoâ€™self! Swap points for gift cards at hundreds of popular stores.ğŸ§–

With this shopping and gift cards app, savings catchers can redeem their reward points right away. Go from scanning to saving money in seconds. Check back for weekly Special Offers and deals to earn extra points. You can earn Amazon gift cards and redeem points for rewards to pamper yourself as low as $3, so youâ€™re not waiting to earn enough points to cash out. 

Trade points for a free cup of coffee, a night out, or a gift for someone. Itâ€™s up to you! Within seconds of scanning your receipts, youâ€™ll have points in your account to swap for gift cards in your wallet. Redeem rewards for hundreds of gift cards to popular stores, including:

-- Target
-- Amazon
-- Walmart
-- Best Buy
-- CVS
-- Panera
-- and more

ğŸ®Level-up on your grocery shopping
In addition to offering quick and easy savings, the Fetch Rewards shopping app also features helpful tools to plan your grocery list, find inspiration for your next recipe, and track your grocery budget.

-- Shopping History - Track where you shop and how much you spend.
-- Shopping List - Build and manage your grocery list. Donâ€™t forget essential ingredients again!
-- Recipe Inspiration - Want to cook something fancy for a special someone? Search our recipe library for thousands of recipes.
-- Digital Recipe Box - Save your favorite recipes to your digital recipe box and add the ingredients to your shopping list.

ğŸ’°Download the Fetch Rewards savings app today to start earning rewards and winning gift cards immediately! Experience how easy it is to become a saving star. The quickest and easiest way to save money when you grocery shop
